ygData.subject: Guilds and things
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all:) I just started a Feir Dal (woodsey elf) Rouge on Brell. Granted the first night was pretty fucking annoying (and if you ve ever been one a new server
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all:) I just started a Feir'Dal (woodsey elf) Rouge on Brell.
Granted the first night was pretty fucking annoying (and if you've
ever been one a new server you can understand my veheminance);
but once the power gamers go away I think it looks promising. If
anyone is interested in starting up a Guild look me up, my name
is Garret. I am making a rather focused effert to stick with a
character for the duration a, damn it all, I'm going to even if it kills
me;)
See you guys later:)
Regardes,
Lonewolf
